mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile( email, name, nickname, photo, tel, birth, gender, tags, match_ok, location_ok, latitude, longitude, location, intro) VALUES( #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{photo}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{tags}, #{matchOk}, #{locationOk}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{location}, #{intro})
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET photo = #{photo}, tags = #{tags}, match_ok = #{matchOk}, location_ok = #{locationOk}, location = #{location}, intro = #{intro} WHERE email=#{email}
UPDATE profile SET latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude}, location_ok = 1 WHERE email=#{email}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM popularity_list WHERE liker=#{liker} and email=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_scrap (member_email, board_id, together_id, event_id, magazine_id, title, url) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{boardId}, #{togetherId}, #{eventId}, #{magazineId}, #{title}, #{url})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writeday, category FROM ( SELECT id, title, writeday, category FROM board WHERE author_id=#{email} UNION ALL SELECT id, title, writeday, 0 AS category FROM drink_together WHERE author_id=#{email}) AS posts ORDER BY writeday DESC
